G

Game - Class in kindred.model
Represents a game match where two Players battle against each other.

Constructs a Game with an empty Map.
game - Variable in class kindred.network.Client
Instance of a Game being played by the Client.
game - Variable in class kindred.view.AbstractView
The game itself.
GameAction - Enum in kindred.model
Contains an enum number for every type of game-related message the Client can send to the Server.
GameAction() - Constructor for enum kindred.model.GameAction
Initially sets all GameAction messages to have no arguments.
gameMsgBundle - Variable in class kindred.view.AbstractView
A ResourceBundle used to get game messages in different languages.
gameStartedMessage(String) - Method in class kindred.view.cli.CLI
Returns a message telling the user that the game has started.
